title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 47-4.3 - Awards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 47-4.3 - Awards

State Regulations
(a) Award schedule. Awards shall be made during the second and third year of residency training in a Primary Care Residency Program. (b) Award. The award shall be up to $15,000 per residency year. (c) Award payments. Awards shall be paid directly to the recipients who will be required to apply the funding to reduce their qualifying debt. (d) Payment of awards. Payment of awards shall be subject to the availability of funds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
47-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
